name: Shanghai & Hourai: The Legendary Flower
description:
Once every 500 years, a sacred flower blooms.

Rumored to be able to cure any illness, Shanghai and Hourai set out on an adventure to seek said flower, to claim its power for  someone very dear to Hourai's heart.

However, there are more to it than what the old pretty witch told them, and they might get dragged into something bigger than a simple medicine run...

Made in RPG Maker VXAce and a submission for Touhou Fan Game Jam 2. Practically my first ever game to be released to the public. Thanks for playing and I hope you enjoyed it!
